description:
A self-developed Fused deposition modeling slicing software produced by Creality.

Creality Print is a self-developed Fused deposition modeling slicing software produced by Creality. It’s a practical and easy-to-use tool that can help you remote control and monitor your 3D printer and help print directly from your computer.
V6.2.2.3203 Software Update Notes:

1. Optimized the UI of process parameter display in the right panel — more parameter settings can now be shown on the same screen.

2. Fixed an error when running the Linux Flatpak version. #430

3. Fixed an issue where the process would remain running after closing the software on Linux. #443

4. Fixed an issue where usernames containing special characters could not log into Creality Cloud accounts. Thanks to @Aeath's Rock for the suggestion.

5. Fixed the error boost::filesystem::status: file or directory is corrupted and unreadable. Thanks to @emoji-道顺 for the suggestion.

6. Fixed an issue where enabling overhang optimization caused the path preview to show only support structures without the model.

7. Fixed low-accuracy temperature calibration models that caused uneven surfaces after slicing.

8. Fixed an issue where some areas could not be painted unless rotated multiple times. Thanks to @稷 for the suggestion.

9. Fixed an issue where the object selection count box text was overlapping. Thanks to @maynar598 for the suggestion.

10. Optimized K2 Plus preset parameters with 0.4mm and 0.6mm nozzles.
